Panzer::
She tried to move, but this dragon's grip was tight and firm. She 
wasn't about to get out of this one. She glared at the dragon. "Fine 
then. You win this round. But be careful Predacon, I will fight you 
if you try to harm me again. I don't take kindly to being burned or 
turned into toasted kitty." she growled letting the dragon know she 
wasn't happy with the situation. "What do you intend to do with me? 
Hold me for ransome? That's won't work. I don't know any of the other 
maximals on this planet. That is, if there are any."  She wondered 
why no one responded to her distress calls. Then she thought that 
maybe this was a pred conquored planet and no maximals existed here. 
She decided she was on her own for getting out of this mess.  

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:

>

> forwards... so you don't have chance to scape"
